info.title: Automation API
info.description: The Automation API is a service to integrate your game with Beam

tags.name: Game
tags.description: Retrieve and manage information about your game in Beam

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: Manage webhook to listen for on-chain events

tags.name: Profiles
tags.description: Retrieve and manage profiles in Beam

tags.name: Assets V2
tags.description: Retrieve assets (ERC-20, ERC-721 and ERC1155) for profiles in your game

tags.name: Transactions V2
tags.description: Retrieve and create transactions on behalf of the profiles in your game

tags.name: Exchange
tags.description: Convert tokens using an exchange for profiles in your game

tags.name: Marketplace V2
tags.description: Manage listings and buy assets through the Beam marketplace

tags.name: Trading
tags.description: Trade assets and tokens between two profiles securely

tags.name: Reporting
tags.description: Get reports on the amount of gas expenditure in your game

tags.name: Chain
tags.description: Directly interact with the chain in order to estimate gas transactions

tags.name: Policy
tags.description: Create policies to charge users in in-game ERC20 tokens to fulfil transactions

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Allows you to validate health of the running services

tags.name: Activity
tags.description: Retrieve activity for the profiles and tokens in your game

transaction.description: The transaction object exists if you created the transaction deterministically and contains information about the on-chain transaction

policy.description: Policy information related to the transaction

profile.description: Profile and wallet information related to the transaction

sortDirection.description: If using `createdAt` for sorting, only `desc` is allowed.

startTime.description: Date time string with YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ format or Unix timestamp in milliseconds

endTime.description: Date time string with YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ format or Unix timestamp in milliseconds

transaction.description: The transaction object exists if you created the transaction deterministically and contains information about the on-chain transaction

signature.description: Signature that can be used to validate whether data comes from Beam API
Signature that can be used to validate whether data comes from Beam API
